not-found.alt: Illustrative image of page not found
not-found.title: Page not found
not-found.description: The page you requested could not be found. Check the URL or navigate back to the main page.

home-page.manage-store: Manage every part of your store and increase sales with the ease you desire
home-page.description: Made for all store sizes, {NAME_APPLICATION} is free and helps you take control of everything without losing focus on what matters most: selling.

cta-section.title: Find & Manage Restaurants
cta-section.subtitle: With Ease
cta-section.description: Use geolocation to discover the best restaurants nearby, manage menus efficiently, and track customer orders seamlessly.

product.title: Exclusive Dish
product.description: Savor the best dishes, freshly prepared by top chefs.

review.quote: This platform revolutionized the way we manage our restaurant. It saves time and increases efficiency!

highlights-section.title: Highlights of {appName}
highlights-section.description: A Complete Restaurant Manager App React Application

highlights.title: Optimize Your Restaurant's Efficiency
highlights.description: Streamline daily operations, reduce manual tasks, and ensure smooth management with our app. Empower your staff to focus on delivering the best dining experience.

highlights.title: Enhance Customer Engagement
highlights.description: Use geolocation to attract nearby customers, provide personalized offers, and create an unforgettable dining experience tailored to your clientele's preferences.

highlights.title: Real-Time Order Tracking and Insights
highlights.description: Monitor orders in real time and access detailed analytics to make data-driven decisions. Understand trends, peak hours, and customer preferences effortlessly.

features-section.title: But wait, there is more
features-section.description: Describe the full extent of your product

features.title: Table Reservation Management
features.description: Easily manage reservations and walk-ins with a dynamic table booking system. Ensure seamless customer experiences during peak hours.

features.title: Menu Customization
features.description: Quickly update and customize your restaurant's menu. Highlight daily specials and manage pricing in real time.

features.title: Inventory Tracking
features.description: Keep track of stock levels and receive alerts for low inventory. Avoid waste and maintain a steady supply chain.

features.title: Order Tracking System
features.description: Monitor all customer orders from the kitchen to the table. Minimize errors and maximize efficiency with real-time updates.

features.title: Customer Insights
features.description: Analyze customer preferences and dining habits with built-in analytics. Personalize the experience and boost customer loyalty.

features.title: Multi-Location Support
features.description: Manage multiple restaurant locations from a single platform. Standardize operations and ensure consistent quality across all branches.

contact-me-section.description: This project is part of my web development studies. If you're interested in discussing it or collaborating, feel free to reach out!

user-responsibilities.heading: User responsibilities
user-responsibilities.content: By using {NAME_APPLICATION} you agree to use the service responsibly and legally this includes but is not limited to respecting others privacy refraining from abusive behavior or harassment and avoiding any illegal activities

data-privacy.heading: Data privacy
data-privacy.content: We take your data privacy seriously any personal information you provide to us will be handled in accordance with our privacy policy we will not share or sell your data to third parties without your consent except as required by law

intellectual-property.heading: Intellectual property
intellectual-property.content: {NAME_APPLICATION} including its software content and brand is owned by antonio s and is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws you may not reproduce modify or distribute any part of the service without prior written consent

liability-limitations.heading: Limitation of liability
liability-limitations.content: We will make reasonable efforts to ensure the reliability and availability of {NAME_APPLICATION} but we cannot guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted or error free we are not liable for any damages or losses resulting from the use of the service including but not limited to direct indirect incidental or consequential damages

terms-changes.heading: Changes to terms
terms-changes.content: We reserve the right to update these terms and conditions at any time any changes will take effect immediately upon the posting of the updated terms on our website it is your responsibility to review the terms and conditions periodically for updates

contact-us.heading: Contact us
contact-us.content: If you have any questions or concerns about these terms and conditions please contact us at {EMAIL_CONTACT_APPLICATION}

sign-in.subtitle: Enter your email and password to sign in!

validations.message: The message must be no longer than 500 characters.

top-rated.title: Find Top-Rated Restaurants
top-rated.description: Explore the best-rated restaurants near you.

nearby-map.title: Nearby Restaurants Map
nearby-map.description: Open an interactive map to locate restaurants close to your location.

search-cuisine.title: Search by Cuisine
search-cuisine.description: Search for restaurants by cuisine, dietary preferences, or keywords.

reserve-table.title: Reserve a Table
reserve-table.description: Easily book a table at your favorite restaurants.

track-orders.title: Track Your Orders
track-orders.description: Keep track of your current and past orders effortlessly.

save-favorites.title: Save Favorites
save-favorites.description: Create a list of your favorite dining spots.

faq.description: Get answers to frequently asked questions about the app.

contact-support.description: Reach out to us for help or suggestions.
